servers.name: purescript-tools-mcp
servers.description: Provides tools for PureScript development tasks via stdio MCP.

tools.name: get_server_status
tools.description: Returns the current status of the server and its components.

tools.name: echo
tools.description: Echoes back the input string.

tools.name: getModuleName
tools.description: Extracts the module name from a PureScript file or code string.

tools.name: getImports
tools.description: Retrieves all import statements with module and submodule information.

tools.name: getTopLevelDeclarationNames
tools.description: Extracts the names of all top-level declarations (functions, data types, type classes, etc.) from a PureScript file or code string.

tools.name: getFunctionNames
tools.description: Gets all function names defined in the code snippet.

tools.name: getTypeSignatures
tools.description: Extracts function type signatures from a code snippet.

tools.name: getLetBindings
tools.description: Finds variables bound in let expressions from a code snippet.

tools.name: getDataTypes
tools.description: Extracts data type declarations from a code snippet.

tools.name: getTypeClasses
tools.description: Gets type class declarations from a code snippet.

tools.name: getInstances
tools.description: Finds type class instances from a code snippet.

tools.name: getTypeAliases
tools.description: Extracts type alias declarations from a code snippet.

tools.name: getStringLiterals
tools.description: Finds all string literals in a code snippet.

tools.name: getIntegerLiterals
tools.description: Extracts all integer literals from a code snippet.

tools.name: getVariableReferences
tools.description: Gets all variable names used in expressions in a code snippet.

tools.name: getRecordFields
tools.description: Extracts record field information from a code snippet.

tools.name: getCasePatterns
tools.description: Analyzes case expression patterns from a code snippet.

tools.name: getDoBindings
tools.description: Finds variable bindings in do blocks from a code snippet.

tools.name: getWhereBindings
tools.description: Extracts function names from where clauses in a code snippet.

tools.name: start_purs_ide_server
tools.description: Starts a purs ide server process. Manages one server instance at a time.

tools.name: stop_purs_ide_server
tools.description: Stops the currently managed purs ide server process.

tools.name: query_purs_ide
tools.description: Sends a command to the currently running purs ide server.

tools.name: generate_dependency_graph
tools.description: Generates a dependency graph for specified PureScript modules.

tools.name: pursIdeLoad
tools.description: Loads modules into the purs ide server. Typically the first command after server start.

tools.name: pursIdeType
tools.description: Looks up the type of a given identifier using purs ide server.

tools.name: pursIdeCwd
tools.description: Gets the current working directory of the purs ide server.

tools.name: pursIdeReset
tools.description: Clears loaded modules in the purs ide server.

tools.name: pursIdeQuit
tools.description: Requests the purs ide server to quit and stops the managed process.

tools.name: pursIdeRebuild
tools.description: Provides a fast rebuild for a single module using purs ide server.

tools.name: pursIdeUsages
tools.description: Finds all usages of a uniquely identified declaration using purs ide server.

tools.name: pursIdeList
tools.description: Lists available modules or imports for a file using purs ide server.
